post.author: BloodRayne
post.body:
(Sorry was the only way to get your attention hehe...)



We're entering the final stages of development and are currently looking for mappers that can put 'oomph' in a map.
Don't hesitate, contact us now!

post.author: BloodRayne
post.body: Will bump this every now and then.

post.author: lowdragon
post.body: I added my info.

post.author: BloodRayne
post.body: Yes, thank you got your email and replied!

post.author: LDAsh
post.body: Anywhere mappers might read up on exactly what sort of maps the project needs? Seems like big SP maps are on the menu, but any need for say some small deathmatch arena type map that one might be able to do up in a week or two? I'd like to do some medieval stuff, but don't have barrels of free time for massive SP layouts.

post.author: BloodRayne
post.body: We do need dedicated mappers for working on large SP maps. Story is everything so the mapping and scriptwork do require more than 1 or 2 weeks time, unfortunately. We will start development on the multiplayer aspects of the game after the first episode is released, so we won't need any help in that regard for the moment.

post.author: BloodRayne
post.body:
We are still looking for mappers!

Interested to join our fantastic team? You'll be part of an exciting team of professional individuals, while working on a fantastic project.

Don't hesitate and apply!
